类 Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The Game class implements the interactive game procedure by quite a few global attributes and methods.

      Starts one round, changing the states of each players.

        public static Player getRoundWinner(java.lang.String chosenAttribute)

        参数:
        chosenAttribute - the attribute selected by nominated player
        返回:
        the winner player of this round
